messages.content: I've been part of a event that's happened here in Glasgow Save our children movement I have been with Wolfpack, The forbidden Scotland, children Warrior's and child protectors Scotland and so on, my names been silent for a while as I never wanted named this last weekend our event has taken off and we have all the different people all over the world joining together to save our children events world wide, I genuinely haven't meant to be an arsehole I have been putting my heart and soul into the event as it means something to me. I get your pissed as I would be too and yeah I'm a fucking idoit, but never lead you on! This whole event means so much to me I want to be able to safe some children from the horrors in this world. I was once that child and I needed a voice I never got it and I always swore if I could find a way I'd help others and that is what I've been doing. All I can say is sorry, I hope you find someone who will treat you like a king. Never meant to upset you. Take care Lx
